text: Motion
Motion
Motion

The, the shop we just visited...
It was amazing, wasn't it...!

Oh, really?
I thought it was just average though.

No... It was unmistakably like another world,
yet it had such a charming atmosphere.

Seeing things like this in person
certainly is educational.
Well, you can't grasp the atmosphere without seeing the real thing, right?

Um, um...
Thank you for telling us various things, Mamimi-chan...

I-I mean, it's not a big deal...
Besides, I wanted to do some shopping too.

Alright! Since we've got the chance!
Let's go and see more things~!

Ahh, that was fun~
It's been a while since we've visited so many shops.

Yeah, it turned out to be a fulfilling trip.
Even though we all say "Gothic", each has its own story...

Mhmm
They all felt so fresh.

W-what kind of story...
will we have...?
Kiriko, it's obvious, isn't it!

We'll become the coolest unit ever,
the coolest in Japan!

Eh...?
In Japan...?

!!
Then... Well...
We'll aim to be the coolest in the universe!!
Oops, we've surpassed the world

Hehe...
It seems like this will be a worthwhile challenge.
